content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot at my work, saw the strange light in the sky and took this photo. it moved across the sky heading east north east at an unknown speed, i would guess it to be much like a aircraft speed.
content.summary: Ufo as seen over chugach mountains from east anchorage 8:30 am 3/1/11

content.detailedDescription:
My sister told me she had seen with husband and two kids the ufo yesterday --- she is not familiar with internet, so i wanted to report instead of her.
anyway, they live literally in the forest without too many neigbours...But ufo was seen by many others and even videotaped by someone - a little further from where my family lives.
it was even in the news, but obviously they say that it was some kind of spacecraft from nasa...Hehe, in this remote area, in hungary...Well, the younger son of my sis told by watching the object: ah yes, it is only a ufo - you dont need to be afraid...Meanwhile the bigger was a bit scared.
anyway, the object moved on very fast, so that was it.
content.summary: They were outside with the kids for snowballing, etc...And had seen a star-like ufo, moving fast and being very light!

content.detailedDescription:
I was working the overnight shift at the wal mart in east stroudsburg, pa.
on the morning of febuary 17th at around 3:30 am i went out to my truck to have a cigarette and listen to the news on my radio.
i looked out of the drivers side window towards interstate 80 which is south of the store.
i saw a small white light in the sky i first thought was a plane dead centered over a small wooded mountain south of the interstate about 1 1/2 miles away.
the light grew brighter and larger. from my perspective lets say from a pencil point to 1/2 inch diameter at arms length.
the light hoovered for about 2 minutes then began to slowly drop.
as it neared the mountain the light it emmitted lit the peak to the point i could see the shadows cast on the snow by the trees on the northern slope of the hill.
the main body of the object dropped behind the mountain but i could still see it's light. the light grew brighter for a few seconds and then disapeared.
i know the area of that little peak very well and there is nothing but woods and a small lake behind it and no place for a helicopter or plane to land.
i've added a google earth capture with a black line showing my position in the parking lot to the estimated area of my sighting.
content.summary: I was sitting in my truck on a break from work when i saw what i first thought was a small plane grow bright then slowly desend behind a mountian.

content.detailedDescription: The witness and a freind were driving near juno beach/ jupiter florida in a convertible. the first witness noticed something coming off the ocean from the east. there was no structure or lights, just large as half a football feild blocking out the stars. he brought it to the attention of his freind who was driving. they both watched in amazement as the object went overhead and they lost sight of it to the west as it passed over condos. it was going slow, made no noise and they beleive they could have easily missed seeing it.
content.summary: Large triangular object blocking stars

content.detailedDescription: The above address is not mine, but it is within my neighborhood. my wife, while using her ipad noticed that our address location is mapped (presumably due to the gps feature.)i expanded to the google earth "street view" to see our house. the ipads are very sensitive when moving the images around and i panned up to the sky, where i saw the most perfect coral pink colored, bell shaped ufo. it also had what i would describe as a "vapor plume" or some type of air disturbance below it in a cylindrical form; almost as if it was the effects from its propulsion system. thinking this must be an anomaly, or reflection (perhaps from the camera, or operators vehicle's windshield) used during the recording of the street views; i moved down the street. to my amazement the image remained correctly orientated in the sky (in the north direction.) as i continued to move the street view, attempting to think which direction a driver taking photographs would go and even when your back would be to the image, when you rotate an pan back up to the sky the image is where you would expect it to be. this fact made it clear this is a real solid object, hovering in the sky. the ufo has shape and dimension and the reflective surface is correct with respect to the location of the sun, (i guess it was about 10:00am, based on the sun's position.) we continued to move the street view in google earth all over our neighborhood and the image was always found to be in about the same location, sometimes tilted differently, or a little more faint. i believe the google recordings in this area was taken in 2009. i'm sure if one can investigate with the google image people, the original recording could be analyzed and will prove to be one of the greatest ufo discoveries in our history. if one types in *(wit's address removed--cms/sg) using google earth, go to street view and then pan up to about 12 o'clock you too will be amazed. as you move down the street (lower in numbers) the image gets smaller as if it is moving to the north; therefore, with calculations, one could estimate it's rate of speed (very slow.) i had to tell someone. i hope it can be looked into and someone would call me with the results; but i don't want to be on the evening news.
content.summary: Discovered ufo in sky while looking at google earth, street view.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 5 am this morning in the sky north and just to the east of the big dipper from my view (downtown chandler) i saw a very smooth, perhaps 1/3 second, meteor fall at an angle toward the earth of about 30degrees from ne to sw.  as bright as venus, but with no flames or tail. a treat and a cause to engage in skywatching for another cup of coffee.

about 15 minutes later i spotted what looked like a satellite, faint but definite starlike light constant and smooth in motion directly to the east of the bigdipper's handle "middle".  sorry for lack of knowledge of stars -  there are two or three stars to the  big dippers "handel" east, almost due north of me and at about 70degrees above horizon which this 'satellite' was passing between.  it was traveling from n/nw to s/se, when it smoothly and abruptly did a sharp turn to the east and then a smooth arc of about 180degrees and headed almost due north. it went ouot, and immediately "lit-up" again, went out, lit-up still traveling and then went out entirely. it didn't appear to "fade" but as tho light turned off. it did not have any flashing lights, or colored lights. it was of the brightness of those stars i mention above to the the east of the bdipper.  

i am somewhat (as interested observer with second story window) familiar with the pattern of local municipal airports and small craft, the metropolis jet flight paths, as well as interstate traffic at high altitude, and military jets. i have not witnessed this before.  i have seen a half dozen or so times differnt satellites and also the iss, none of those made such an odd and seemingly unpredictable turn.

i went in and got my camera, but it did not appear again.
content.summary: Apparent satellite does 360 turn fades, relights, fades

content.detailedDescription:
Right first things first im going to start with the first part and do it piece by piece but anyway.
i am aware that the dream was real i just need to know more on what happed in the dream so i can finally put this in the past but lets start.

i started seeing weird objects in the sky in the corner of my eye for about the months of may 5 till the night of the incident and i would always see these objects and most of the time when i looked at them they would disappear within 3 seconds a couple of times one second but i never thought to much of it at the time and during the nights is when it got creepy since i would some lights in the mountains that would get close enough for me to be able to tell what the shape of the ufo is for about 2 seconds before completely disappearing i think the size of the ufo was about 300 - 350 feet long and im not really sure how thick it was but this accounts for all the times i have seen the ufo before having this dream or whatever it was.

the movement patterns of the ufo always flew from such a distance it was the size of the end of a pin to about  500 feet away and when it reached that point every time it would just stop hover (i always got the feeling of being watched when it stopped) and then 3-5 seconds later it would fly off.

and this would happen most of the time on a clear night sometimes during a darker cloudy day but always within those conditions, the hight of the ufo was about 300 - 500 feet in the air and was at least 1000 feet or more away and  it was always the same shape, a triangular shape with a slight curve to the top of it and it was silver in color. now im not sure of the dates of when i have seen them but i have see them 6 times during the month of may starting at the 5th and 7 times during june starting on the 1st. 

every night that happened i got scared and would stay up for hours with my pets in my room so i knew if they would be coming since i thought that well my dogs would get scared first before something happens and i would have at least some kind of warning.

now on to the dream, the night started like every other night and i had seen the ufo the one and only time on the night of the 15th of july i went 2 sleep around 11:30 and then the dream started well what seemed like a dream at least but anyway, the dream started out where i remember being in my room laying down on my bed watching tv when suddenly the cable shut of and i got the blue screen of no signal and 3 seconds of that and it shut off and my room was suddenly plunged into pitch black and i got up and tried to turn on my light but it would not work there was no power at all and when i tried to open the door to go check the fuse i had no strength in my legs to move and i could not lift my arms or hands in anyway to open the door yet i was in a calm state so i just went back to bed and what felt like 5 mins of lying there i suddenly felt like i was not alone in my room (by the way my room layout is my bed is under my window but takes up the space between the chimney in the middle of the room and the wall towards my bed on the other side of that chimney in the north east corner  that was blocked by vision by chimney) and i had this feeling that i was not alone and well i didn't really want to see it and im glad that it was pitch black cuz in my head i have always told my self that if they want to abduct me that they would at least do it in a way where i cant see them or they take the appearance if there grays as humans but they at least granted me that one wish so i get the sense that they where not benevolent beings.

anyway the next thing i remember is blacking out and i remember the cold sensation of being on a metal or steel table with extreme bright lights my eyes where taking a very very to adjust and i remember looking to my left and seeing a metal door that slid open and a  robe that was being dragged against the ground like something was wearing it and the next thing i new i got the feeling in my head that i should look straight up and so i did when i did i saw to my fright four alien grays looking straight down at me each of there heads positioned at the four lines of my main sight and thats all i remember from my dream.

now for paranormal activity i have not noticed anything ufo/alien related besides the ufos before hand and sometimes but not as frequent as before that i do still see them.

sometimes but not all the time do i feel like im being watched sometimes by someone in a van,truck, or car always seem to be watching me when that happens and its always a white or black vehicle nothing else and i have heard that might be something to do with the men in black im not sure it could be, i also feel that im being watched from the sky and when i go to look nothings there i dont really feel like im being watched at night time more then the day and it happens almost anywhere i am and could happen at anytime. now as for the symbols i have showed you i did find the part of the episode by ufo hunters aired on history channel *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg)related the symbols are showed right in the middle of the video and the one thing i have and i cant get out of my head is i have a really haunting feeling in my head that i know what it means but its hard for me to get the info out. 

now for the special ability's i have none that i know so far but i do feel like i am able to read symbols that are on anything else or on crafts how i can do that i do not know but i do feel like i can and one day if possible help from someone to bring that out and i am drawn to what i truly feel are real and not faked by man i seem to want to be drawn to the real thing. (just as i said that i had the hair on my entire stand up and drop in temperature if that means anything). and i have a fear of the dark if im alone and i feel that im being watched but for some reason my fear goes away as soon i turn on a light. i feel like i am being abducted from time to time because i get the feeling sometimes that i have not spent as much time i have in certain area that i am in for example i have only been in my room for 2 hours according to me but to my clock and everyone else i have been gone for 6 hours or more. one time i remember being watched by someone in a black vehicle no licence plate or anything just a plain truck and the next thing i know i look into the sky and see a black triangle object in the distance but close enough that i feel im being watched and most of the time the truck or van drives of and the ufo flys off at incredible speeds i have not one clue why that is happing but it happens some of the times.

if you have any more questions or i missed some info that you would like to know email me back i also have a phone if your interested communicating by phone might be easier idk
content.summary: Alien abduction from home

content.detailedDescription: I go outside to smoke cigarettes sometimes and last week i started noticing an object about twice but thought it was a small airplane.  tonight, it has gotten closer and more visible and it's not an airplane.  it also appears to be spinning because the colors of red and/or blue rotates. it looks like a cross within a diamond the horizontal line is what changes in color.  what made me first notice it was i like looking at the stars but it looks much larger than the rest so i continued looking and trying to make out what it could be.  originally, it was a star then a light atop an antenna, next an airplane...Now a ufo, because it's not out there every night.  i have been going out to look even without smoking.  i feel amazed seeing it and drawn to look, but also fearful.  i haven't lost sight of it...It's out there now just hovering with no planes in sight.  what is it...Really??
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looks like a cross with red and blue lights. hovering/moving very slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony looking up at the sky while taking a smoke break from some computer work & noticed 3 different objects that caught my eye. the first was red & white blinking lights. i initially thought it was an airplane because that seemed like the most logical explanation. then i noticed the wasn't really any sort of pattern to the blinking of the lights. i was a crew chief for a cargo plane in the usaf so i know what planes in the night sky (should) look like. as it moved furher away i still thought "this could be an airplane flying east". i then noticed the object move right, left, up and down very quickly. it finally moved so far out of sight that i could no longer see it. while standing there contemplating what i just saw, i noticed a large bright star towards the right (higher than the 1st object). it was really bright and looked like a star. the star like object began to look more and more oval shaped. i assumed the research i had done on ufo's could be making my mind play tricks on me. i shrugged it off and looked towards a park that i live about a block away from. i noticed what i thought at first were birds flying in a triangular shape formation (as birds often do). as the "birds" got closer i realized none of them were flapping their wings and they stayed in a perfect boomerang like formation. not moving apart or together, up or down. they were just cruising along. i then thought maybe i'm misjudging distance and started really focusing on the objects. i then thought well maybe it's jets flying in formation since it's not uncommon here since i live somewhat close to a navy base. i watched as they got closer & closer and began to pass my house. as i watched i waited to hear the jet engines but heard nothing. this boomerang shaped object just cruised right along not moving higher, lower or side to side. it moved in a steady straight line like it had a specific destination it was aiming for. it then dissappeared out of sight. i almost forgot what i had seen about a half an hour later until  mentioned it to my friend. while talking with him on the phone i went back out to look at the odd "star" i had seen 30 minutes prior and it was gone. no stars at all where i had just seen this "star". he said he had seen something similar a few years ago and suggested i report it to this web site. so, here i am and this was my experience. think what you want, but i saw what i saw!
content.summary: I was on my balcony looking up at the sky while taking a smoke break from some computer work & noticed 3 different objects that caught my eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the back porch and looking to the north west, when some 25 to 50 gold or orange colored lights in one big mass in v formation flow to the west and in a approxiamte 5%  downard direction. i have these lights before but not that many. this the second time this year that i e i have seen these lights. i hope that some others in the clarion shippenville area seen them also and will report the sighting.
content.summary: About 25 to 50 round  lights in the sky in v formation

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my fiance was out on my front poorch. she was talking on the phone with her mom. i had walked out onto the walk way and saw a real bright white light. i told my fiance hurry come look at this! she got up from the swing and came to where i was standing and the light we looked at got brighter and brighter. if you stretched out your arm and pointed your index finger it got about the size of a nickle maybe a little bigger. 
it got so bright that it would actually hurt your eyes at times. i have never seen anything in my life this big and bright. i took a picture of it with my phone before it got to its full size. i am still amazed as to what we saw. my son also witnessed this. my fiance doesnt believe as i do in the ufo stories. but she was actually dumbfounded as was my son. i started walking threw my yard over to the edge of my nighbors yard so i could get a better picture of it, as this was the time of the brightest it got. as i got the point of taking a picture it dimmed out and started going to the left and was then flashing with 2 red lights. as it was moving away a jet plain came threw to where its location was at the time(i believe this jet liner is the reason it moved away.) the location it was in is the location of the air traffic atlanta airport travels. another note to this story i as was looking at it at its brightes point it was like it was shooting light into me. it's really hard for me to explain this for i've never had any exsperience like this before. i also felt incedibly good. i mean really good like i was on cloud 9. i know this sounds crazy but i'm trying to see if anybody else has experienced this before. i have reported sighting to you guuys before a few years ago as to this area seems to be a spot these objects like. i also calle the local sheriff's office and asked if anybody else reported this sighting. they informed me that knowone else had reported anything. the picture i took i sent it to a friend of mine who has also seen objects with me at a time they where there almost every night. he told me it looked like the moon. then i told him it got about 10 times bigger than that. my fiance doesnt believe but after tonight she has a totally different opinion lol!
content.summary: Bright star. got about 10 times brighter.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking east bound on mockingbird ln. on the north side of the street in front of my apartment. i noticed on my right basically the southeast a half disc bright red orange about the speed and altitude of an aircraft moving to the northwest. the object was clear as was the weather and it was not an airplane as there were several other airplanes around clearly visible . this object had no blinking lights and it looked like it was a fireball. after it flew over, it slowly disappeared in the distance, not because of distance, it just evaporated. three other people saw this, a woman and two children, a boy and a girl about 8-11 years old. the boy became terrified and almost started crying. i am intrigued by this phenomimon and i have not seen one like this before. i was pissed that i did not have a camera or phone handy.
content.summary: I saw an orange half disc that looked like it was on fire.

content.detailedDescription:
Recorded 1/27/2011 at 2056 on yukon night ranger with video output to easy capusb device and recorded with ufo capture software v2.2

first part has date time stuff, then video stops movement, then continues without date time, near end little sat appears in bottom right. video stopage happens alot on long running videos and do not know why.
this is an unattended recording using software that is motion activated.
the software is recording all the time so when motion is detected, it show the frames leading up to the event as well.

the camera was pointed sse at approx 160deg, elevation was approx 40deg. the main ir illuminator was off, but short range ir was on.
the sun had set for about an hour, and the object moved from east to west.
a satillite moving west to east can be seen at the end of the video, in the lower rh corner. 

the video was started at 2056:12 and was written to the disk at 2058:25 so it took about 2 min 13 seconds.
the ufocapture avi lasted 1 min 41 seconds with some dead time noted on the screen. many of my captures do this, don't know why?

first i thought the software had injected an image onto the video while recording, cause it looked so strange. and my trial version of the software was set to expire.It looked at first like a big rocket ship, so weird. 

i noticed this the next day while reviewing the videos captured the previous night. 

the report with my group can be found at:
 *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Ship like object appears in unattended motion activated video

content.detailedDescription:
Back in 1979 ... or 1980 ... (don't recall the exact date and time) ... a number of friends (15 or more) and myself ... had hiked up to the top of a hill /rock outcrop ... and were hanging out for some time ... this event occurred sometime around 5:00 pm or so ??? (near the end of the day anyway) as we are hanging out ... one of the girls next to me ... said something about lights in the sky ... and was she the only one who could see them ... she pointed out to the horizon ... i then saw them ... and said to her ... no ... your not the only one ... i see them too.   i then tell the others to check out these lights.   at first .. there were 3 small lights ... like stars ... low in the sky on the horizon ... shimmering ... just there ... suspended ???  then ... the one on the right disappeared ... a few seconds later ... the middle one disappeared ... then ... a few seconds later ... the left one disappeared.  everyone was like ... what was that ???   then ... maybe 30 seconds later ... a much bigger brighter light appeared ... shimmering ... then ... a small light appeared to the right ... and a small light appeared to the left ... all shimmering ... like stars ... then the small ones disappeared ... and the bigger one began to slowly fade away ... from right to left ... until it was gone ???
once again ... we are all like ... what was that ??? ... as we tried to explain it ... maybe after 30 seconds or less ... off to the left of the original position of the lights in the sky ... we see 6 small lights ... just like the original ones ... in a pattern of 3 and 3 ... (3 side by side on the left ... 3 side by side on the right ... the right ones being slightly lower in the sky than the the other 3 on the left) ... shimmering ... suspended like ... after maybe 10 seconds or less ... these lights began to move in a zig-zag pattern ... in formation ... across the sky ... for several seconds ... and then ...Just disappeared ???  ???  we were like ... what the heck ??? (and a few other words) we tried to explain it ???  plane? no ... no sound ? helicopter? no ... no sound ... lights to far apart?  heat lightning ? no ... reflections of car lights from the highway onto the clouds? no ... only a few clouds in the sky ... here and there ???    granite rock creating sparks thrown up into the atmosphere? no ... ???  (that was a good one)  try as we might ... we could not explain it.  
a little more information ... this occurred in the sky over the vermont yankee atomic plant ... coincidence ???  ( aliens observing our energy facilities ???)    in all ... it was a mystery to each of us.

i have written to you today about this incident because last week ... i happened to see a program on tv ... with your organization doing research and interviews with people about sightings they had recently in the area southwest of phoenix,arizona.  these lights over phoenix ... looked exactly like the ones i had seen in new hampshire ... many years ago ... ???   coincidence ???
content.summary: Several small bright lights/ one large bright light / shimmering in the sky ... appeared ... disappeared ... appeared ... faded one by one ... appeared ,,, zig-zagged ... disappeared ???

content.detailedDescription:
On february 21, 2011 my daughter and i were driving from warwick, pennsylvania headed north on rt. 611 towards our home in pipersville, pa.  

we saw the lights out to the right of our car when we were around bristol road and rt. 611.  there was one white circle in the middle and 4 or 5 smaller circles around that pulsated into one circle and then out, causing the smaller circles to be around the middle circle.  

at first we thought they were from a local school or store, we thought there must be a sale at fred beans ford or a local store, but we did not see a location along the way that would confirm that. we also could not see a light that came from the ground.  the lights followed us the entire way home, not getting smaller or appearing to be further away. when we pulled in our driveway they were above our neighbor���s back yard and very visible with no source of light from the ground. the lights were hovering, doing that same in and out motion over and over. we tried several times to take video and a photo with a smart phone, but we could not get the image on either.

the drive takes about 25 minutes.  my daughter and i joked that they were ufos or something not from our planet, however there was a hint of seriousness because we couldn���t attribute the lights to another source.
during the oscars there was a movie trailer for a new sci-fi movie and the opening scene had the same exact lights and movement that we saw last week.  that convinced me that what we saw was in fact something else���..

for the record, i do not follow this kind of stuff. i have never blogged or posted about something like this in the past.  my daughter is 11, i am 42, do not use drugs, was not under the influence of anything, i work in corporate america, we are a normal american family.
content.summary: Circular lights - one in the center 4 or 5 around that go in and out around the center circle

content.detailedDescription:
I was checking out google moon when i noticed a black spot and zoomed in.  to my surprise there was, what looks like, a manufactured craft of unknown orgin flying at an altitude of 2000'+/-.  i measured the craft and its approx 1/2 mile long and over a 1/4 mile wide at the wings. after catching my breath, i decided this is a manufactured vehicle, so i thought there must be more!  i then found an identical craft 800 miles away.  the lighting was a little darker, but the vehicle make was the same.  i'm hoping someone could answer what these are, or at least let people know whats out there!  thanks!

vehicle positions:

vehicle one: 8*53'37.46"n  60*05'42.26"e (google moon)

vehicle two: 22*53'58.69"n 20*15'13.76"e (google moon)

* = degrees

tom maple
518-334-0564

ps i can send the pdf links if you need! thanks!
content.summary: Found 2 ufos on google moon very good detail!! (read)

content.detailedDescription: I saw a light that i had seen in the distance(possible over lake erie) and wanted to get a picture. i walked out to the front porch and as i took the picture and the flash went off, i saw the craft the size of a large plane hovering silently. after the flash, i tried to see the craft and i was unable to see it without the flash. i told myself that i didn't see anything and went back in the house. i had forgotten about the incident until i was printing some of the pictures i had taken, i brighten the picture and found that the picture showed the lights of the outline of the craft. i light i wanted to capture is in the upper left corner and the craft is on the right side.
content.summary: Black triangle stationary, silent , over upton avenue

content.detailedDescription: Searched google maps for something unrelated and saw this in background
content.summary: Google earth streetview image with ufo

content.detailedDescription: Out on porch smoking, i noticed a very bright flash, some noise however allot of back ground noise unable to determine exact noise.... if this was an aircraft it must have been traveling above super sonic speed... i was looking to the north toward hill airforce base, object was aproxamatly 80,000 feet or above.... no i'm not crazy i've worked around aircraft for many years. light was very unusual ..
content.summary: Quick bright flash much much brighter than stars. i may of heard a plane noise however object never appeared again and i had a good view of the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were taking a walk around the pond in livingston near the high school one night just catching up and hanging out. we had made a few laps around the pond and as we came up to the top of the steep hill there, over our right shoulder there was a bright green flash of light in the sky. it didn't last but a few seconds and it didn't streak very far across the sky, maybe, from my perspective, an inch, or what i'd guess from it's perspective 10 - 20 miles. immediately me and my friend turned to each other and asked if we had seen it.

it was quite creepy to have seen. in my opinion the only thing it could have been otherwise was an asteroid extremely rich in copper (as it burns green, as it would upon impact with the atmosphere) but it was unidentified, and flying, and i'm not 100% sure if i'd believe the asteroid possibility after seeing it.
content.summary: Flash of green light across sky

content.detailedDescription:
(8:40 p.M.) while traveling down 20th street, also known as cty rd. k, from oshkosh to omro, wisconsin, my girlfriend and i crested a hill near my home which is located in the countryside of both cities.  on the downslope of the hill i was conversing with my girlfriend when i noticed a series of orange orbs over the treeline of my neighbors home.  they quickly flashed and disappeared.  i could not verify distance or size because it was so sudden.  at first i was shocked, and was not certain of what i had saw.  i thought perhaps it was reflection of a garage light or aircraft of known origin as we are about twenty miles from an airport.  regardless, my girlfriend did not notice the lights or the flash as she was intent on the road at the time.
(8:45 p.M.) she pulled into my driveway, which is located on the corner of k and sand pit road. while entering my home, i turned to wave goodbye, and noticed a single orb over the field across the road.  i pointed and attempted to get the attention of my girlfriend, who put her car in park and turned just to see the orb collapse upon itself.  at this point i knew i was dealing with something out of the ordinary.  
(8:50 p.M.) i walked back to the car, as my girlfriend exited the vehicle, and while staring into the distance to the point where the orb had finished (about a half mile west), a large, chandelier shaped object appeared less than a quarter mile away from us above the filed across the road.  it had several small orange orbs surrounding a large central ball of a darker orange hue. this object stayed lit for several seconds before collapsing upon itself.
(9:00 p.M) at this point my girlfriend, who was shaken by the incident, returned home.  about a minute after she had left, i still remained outside staring in wonder at the night sky.  suddenly, a v shaped formation of orange lights hovered, flashed, and dimmed heading southwest.  these lights appeared once more and disappeared.  i entered my home to inform my family of the incident.  i noticed several cars parked alongside k which must have noticed the object too.  i grabbed a pair of keys and jumped into my father's car and took off down k toward the last spot i saw the lights.  two vehicles were parked alongside k between knot road and cty rd ff.  i turned down ff, heading south, and swung into my friend's home on the corner of ff and hwy 91.  i asked if anyone had seen anthing out of the ordinary.
(9:45 p.M.) having shared texts with two friends who had seen the lights and explaining my story to those at my friend's house, i decided to go out for a cigarette.  while scanning the skies, the orange lights appeared as a single line above the tree lines south of hwy 91.  i scanned for several minutes before returning inside to grab my keys.
(10:00 p.M.) i returned home without another sighting of the lights.  i contacted the oshkosh police department and informed them of my sighting.  an officer came to my home and took a police report on the lights.  he also informed me that the nearby airport and air traffic controllers did not claim to have any aircraft in the area at the time of the incident. he took the names of the other witnesses, and after telling me he gets reports in this area from time to time of similar lights and to not worry about it, he left.

*these sightings persisted for several weeks, and months, to this day.  though not as frequently as they did for the last two weeks of november.  i've contacted several individuals who saw the lights on multiple occasions, and in different areas of the night sky, although mostly located in the area of k and sand pit road.  i have had three sightings myself since the original november sighting including a streaking light that reminded me of a roman candle styled firework, except each ball remained lit and collapsed in sequence.  generally speaking, the sightings are of single orbs, however, as described above, they do occasionally drift from that description.*

(i do have sketches of the sightings, however, i do not have them uploaded to this computer yet. to date, several attempts to videotape the lights has failed. two photographs do exist, but the quality and lighting makes it impossible to determine what the object is.)
content.summary: Series of orange lights in v-formation, chandelier, and singular orb seen over period of two hours.

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were heading south on i-5, when we both spotted two giants bright lights in the sky. looked as if they were coming towards us like a plane, but continued to watch. almost 360'd the craft and the lights were still as bright as they had been before. finally, pulled off the road and watched it. as it flew towards us, we could hear a noise like that of an airplane, and it was descending fast although no airport nearby anywhere. as it came closer, there were 6-8 red blinking lights, and 4 giant bright white lights; 1 on each corner of the craft and one right in the middle. while flying over us the noise got louder and louder. continued to watch. well, it started to loop around to where it was on the other side of the northbound traffic to where there is a huge field. there was only one tree blocking our view of the field. it continued looping, and looping, until behind the tree. we waited a good minute until my dad pulled forward more on the road and turned off the car. there was no sound but cars going by us. and we could not see any bright lights with how low it was. obviously if this was a plane, we would have seen it land or crash in the giant field. i begged my dad to go see what it was and if it had landed. but we were already on a tight schedule. on our way home, we went back to the field and went through all the back roads it could have been on where we would have seen it. nothing. if anyone else saw this, or any of the strange other things going on here, please report it. we have had at least 2 or 3 sightings in the past week.
content.summary: Huge black triangle with tons of lights, flew right over us disguised as a plane, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving a friend home from a night out. we both saw a large craft in the sky moving slowly (10 - 25 mph) from east to west. we stopped the car and got out. we watched it moving very slowly, above the roadway and treetops. we were astonished by what we were seeing! i have never seen anything like it before or since. estimated altitude was 1000 ft. the size of the craft was estimated to be three to five football fields in diameter. we were on the edge of and directly below it. it was flat bottomed with a scattering of small, round colored lights. the color of the craft was dark or black. it was so large that we could not distinguish the outline of it's shape. it made no sound! it was completely silent! the trees on either side of the road obscured our view somewhat, so that we could not see the entire craft at one time. it took about 10 minutes to completely pass by. 

after it had passed, we got in the car, turned around and proceeded up the road to another road that ran in nearly the direction the craft was moving. we attempted to chase it but could not locate it.

i cannot explain what we saw that night. many years have passed since then. i haven't thought much about it since then. but in recent months, it has been more at the forefront of my mind. to me, it proves that there is a way to fly silently and that the craft was likely from another world.
content.summary: very large craft seen flying low, silently, slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I wrote the following the day that i saw this craft on september 7th, 2010.

i am a skeptic when it comes to ufos. however i am struggling over the sighting of an object i saw early this morning at 1 a.M. (september 7, 2010). i was traveling south on i-35 and turning east on 820 freeway in the fort worth area. it is an area where planes are frequently seen landing to the north into alliance airport. it was an overcast night so when i first saw the craft, the lights on the craft looked like bright landing lights and then it disappeared into the overcast.  when it came out of the overcast clouds the object was directly over my car (about 300-500 ft)and the landing lights were no longer there.  i just saw the glow from 12-15 windows. this was a large circular object with approximately 12-15 lights facing downward near the outer rim forming a round shape.

these windows were square, on the bottom and curved up onto the side of the craft.   every other light appeared either brighter or dimmer���that is���there were two levels of brightness in the lights���every other one having a different level of brightness. overcast was low but i still was able to observe a circular pattern and definitely was not a passenger plane. the lights were not as bright as landing lights would be���in fact they were quite dim by comparison and looked very much like large windows on a craft. 

this object was not making the usual nw approach���instead it was traveling due west���not typical of craft in that area���not that is doesn���t happen but i just haven���t seen them do it. it doesn���t matter���the craft i witnessed looked nothing like an airliner. it was about the height of airliner on approach and also about the size of such. i have no logical explanation for what i saw.
content.summary: Sighting of a large circular craft in the ft. worth area, september 2010

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:
 
in october 2009 while attending the houston airshow my girlfriend and i observed several small, silver disks hovering way above the show.  other people also observed them as well but because we could not definitively identify them we dismissed them as irrelevant, yet intriguing.  today (2/28/11) while i was going through old files on my computer i ran across a video from that airshow.  i was shocked at what i saw come flying into the shot between 0:00-0:04 seconds of the video; another unidentified flying object that at the time would have been too fast for the eye to catch.
 
i am attaching photos of ufo���s in the sky, along with the video for your own analysis.

p.S. i did a search on the internet about this event and it looks like we were not the only ones that saw something that day.
content.summary: Fast flying orb

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo fly by in the background while watching today's spacewalk with steve bowen in space. it was about 2:41pm 2/28/11 on tv! you can look that up and see it to...Right after it flew by..Camera switch as if they didnt want anyone to have noticed. but i saw it. they are watching the space walk.It was not a satillite! it was a light/disc flying by.
content.summary: Saw ufo during spacewalk

content.detailedDescription: I am presently a patient in a skilled nursing facility. i watch the sky every chance i get. approximately one week ago, i was star gazing and happened to catch this object make some rather abrupt and jerky movements.I had several other people look at this and we all agree this is most likely a ufo. this object stays in the same area just east of orion's belt. i am surprised that this object has not been reported. this object appears to have a brilliant white light that changes amplitude and has some red, green, and blue light that appear intermittently. i and others have observed this object every night as it rises and sets. it has remained in this location relative to orion's belt. perhaps you can verify this sighting and post an opinion on this event.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I discovered this object a week ago just east of orians' belt.

content.detailedDescription:
Was at metaphor cafe on 2nd street in escondido, ca. around 7pm (shortly before possibly) everyone ran outside to see something weird in the sky. i followed and what i saw was really strange. 

it was like a saucer shape with flashing red and blue lights, and it was still. it wasn't moving... which made us able to identify the shape. then it slowly began to lower, and it eventually disappeared among trees where we couldn't see anymore. 

someone was able to get it on video and posted it on youtube. i looked today.
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Flashing blue and red

content.detailedDescription:
It all started when i was walking back from meeting some friends during june 15 2009 and around 2 am as i was heading through my little field that is very small i happed to look up in the sky like i always do but to my surprise i noticed something in the corner of my eye and upon further investigation it turned out to what look like a triangle shaped object directly above me about  the normal hight that a private air plane is allowed to fly at. the object was hovering motionless above me with no sound at all during a clear full moon light light, the object had no lights at all and seemed to be silver in color. and upon seeing this object i got the feeling i was being watched and i also had a feeling of fright so i ran the rest of the way home.

now upon that night i had a dream where all i can remember is lying in bed having the feeling of being watched through the darkenes of my attic room and all i can really remember after that is i was lying on a what felt like a cold steel table and i remember looking up and to my horror i remember seeing four alien greys all standing around my head examining my head.

ever since that event i feel as tho i am being watched and like some people in this world i put allot of resurch into aliens and government cover ups and even the possibility that aliens might be living among us hiding. but whenever i feel im getting somewhere with all of this when i feel im geting close i get headaches painful ones and im not sure why. to this day i feel i am still being watched but i have no idea by who, weather it be aliens or the men in back.
content.summary: Dark triangular object

content.detailedDescription: This was an amazing moment in my life, i was on my way to classes at the local college and i was sitting in my parked car listening to the radio when out of no where a boxy, airplane like figure was floating in the sky. not moving, just floating there for almost 5 seconds, i gasped, i knew it was a ufo that i had seen. it looked so much like an airplane, almost like the aliens are copying our designs of our air crafts in order to get closer to our land with out suspision. i know what i saw, call me crazy but they are coming. i know they are, why else would they copy our models of design? to get closer of course and figure out how to defeat us. at first i thought the object was just a weird looking  airplane since we live next to a military base, then i noticed it was not moving, at all. just floating until it completely vanished; almost like it was able to go to another dimension whenever it pleased. the object only floated, it was boxy and was silver-ish in color and it was very low to the ground, that is why it caught my attention.
content.summary: Huge, boxy, floating, disappeared before my eyes.
